title: Protection From Dajjal
description: Authentic supplications for Protection From Dajjal
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Protection From Dajjal. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 199
items.arabic: ((مَنْ حَفِظَ عَشْرَ آيَاتٍ مِنْ أَوَّلِ سُورَةِ الْكَهْفِ عُصِمَ مِنَ الدَّجَّالِ)) ، وَالْاسْتِعَاذَةُ بِاللَّهِ مِنْ فِتْنَتِهِ عَقِبَ التَّشَهُّدِ الْأَخِيرِ مِنْ كُلِّ صَلاَةٍ.
